HERO.DESCRIPTION: Khmer Kansai Co., Ltd. collects and recycles unwanted appliances, plastics, aluminum, iron, bicycles, construction machinery, and agricultural equipment. We contribute to eco-friendly activities by reusing these resources in Southeast Asia.

MISSION.TITLE: Towards a Sustainable Future
MISSION.SUBTITLE: We aim to reduce environmental impact and realize a circular society for a sustainable future.

RECYCLE.TITLE: Recycling Business
RECYCLE.DESCRIPTION: Collection and recycling of plastics, aluminum, iron, and other metal scraps

BUYING.TITLE: Purchase Business
BUYING.DESCRIPTION: Fair price purchase and recycling of appliances, cars, and leather products

MACHINERY.TITLE: Construction & Agricultural Machinery
MACHINERY.DESCRIPTION: High-value purchase and export agency for construction machinery and agricultural equipment

GLOBAL.TITLE: Global Expansion
GLOBAL.DESCRIPTION: Reuse and sales network in Southeast Asia

CTA.TITLE: Feel Free to Contact Us First
CTA.SUBTITLE: Even items you think are no longer usable may be able to create new value.

MESSAGE.TITLE: Message from the President
MESSAGE.P1: Thank you for visiting the website of Khmer Kansai Co., Ltd.
MESSAGE.P2: We aim to realize a circular society that values resources. Through the collection of unwanted appliances, plastics, aluminum, iron, bicycles, construction machinery, and agricultural equipment, we contribute to reducing environmental impact while supporting our customers' lives through our purchase business and estate clearance services.
MESSAGE.P3: Even items you think can no longer be used may be able to create new value. Rather than simply disposing of waste, we propose the best ways to 'connect to the next' and link to a sustainable future.
MESSAGE.P4: We will continue to walk with the local community, providing environmentally friendly and reliable services. We look forward to your continued support of Khmer Kansai Co., Ltd.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRO: Khmer Kansai Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company') recognizes the importance of personal information protection in the services provided on this website, complies with the Act on the Protection of Personal Information, and establishes the following Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as 'this Policy').

SECTION1.TITLE: Article 1 (Personal Information)
SECTION1.CONTENT: 'Personal Information' refers to 'personal information' as defined in the Personal Information Protection Act, and is information about a living individual that can identify the specific individual by name, date of birth, address, telephone number, contact information, or other descriptions contained in the information, as well as data related to appearance, fingerprints, voiceprints, and health insurance card insurer numbers that can identify the specific individual from the information alone (personal identification information).

SECTION3.TITLE: Article 3 (Method of Acquiring Personal Information)
SECTION3.CONTENT: The Company may ask for personal information such as name, date of birth, address, telephone number, and email address when users register for use.

SECTION4.TITLE: Article 4 (Purpose of Collecting and Using Personal Information)
PURPOSES: Provision and operation of Company services
Response to inquiries from customers (including identity verification)
Information provision regarding services being used and guidance on other services provided by the Company
Contact regarding maintenance, important notices, etc.
Identification of customers who violate terms of use or use services for fraudulent or unreasonable purposes, and refusal of use
Confirmation and viewing of registered information, changes, deletion, and viewing of usage status
Billing for usage fees for paid services
Purposes incidental to the above purposes of use

SECTION5.TITLE: Article 5 (Security Measures for Personal Information)
SECTION5.CONTENT: To protect personal information, the Company takes measures such as management of personal information, designation of methods for carrying out personal information, and prevention of unauthorized access from third parties based on regulations regarding information security, and strives to prevent leakage, loss, falsification, and destruction of personal information.

SECTION6.TITLE: Article 6 (Disclosure of Personal Information)
SECTION6.CONTENT: When requested by the individual to disclose personal information and records of provision to third parties, the Company will disclose this to the individual without delay.

SECTION7.TITLE: Article 7 (Correction and Deletion of Personal Information)
SECTION7.CONTENT: If the personal information held by the Company is incorrect, the customer can request correction, addition, or deletion (hereinafter referred to as 'correction, etc.') of the personal information according to procedures established by the Company.

SECTION8.TITLE: Article 8 (Contact for Inquiries)
SECTION8.CONTENT: For questions, uncertainties, complaints, and other inquiries regarding the handling of personal information by the Company, please contact the following:

PLASTIC_RECYCLE.TITLE: Plastic Recycling & Manufacturing
PLASTIC_RECYCLE.DESCRIPTION: We are a leading plastic recycling manufacturer. We purchase various types of waste plastic, process them through advanced sorting, cleaning, shredding, and pelletizing to produce high-quality reusable plastic pellets for industrial manufacturing.

BUYING.TITLE: We Buy All Types:
BUYING.DESC: Industrial waste, post-consumer plastic, mixed plastics, factory scraps

MANUFACTURING.TITLE: Manufacturing:
MANUFACTURING.DESC: State-of-the-art pelletizing facilities producing premium quality granules

SELLING.TITLE: We Sell:
SELLING.DESC: Virgin-quality recycled pellets, custom compounds, color-matched materials

PLASTIC_TYPES.TITLE: Plastic Types We Handle
PLASTIC_TYPES.CLICK_DETAILS: クリックして詳細を見る

METAL.TITLE: Metal Trading
METAL.SUBTITLE: 金属買取・販売 | Copper & Aluminum Specialists

COPPER.TITLE: Copper
COPPER.DESC: We buy and sell copper wires, pipes, sheets, and scrap. High market value with competitive pricing. Both recycled and prime quality available.

ALUMINUM.TITLE: Aluminum
ALUMINUM.DESC: Cans, sheets, profiles, extrusions, and industrial scrap. We handle both recycled materials and prime aluminum products for various industries.

MACHINERY.TITLE: Construction & Agricultural Machinery
MACHINERY.SUBTITLE: 建設機械・農機具 | Buy, Refurbish, Sell
MACHINERY.QUOTE: Global export to Cambodia, Vietnam, and other Southeast Asian markets. We buy from auctions, direct sales, and trade-ins.
MACHINERY.MORE_EQUIPMENT: More Equipment / その他の設備

GALLERY.TITLE: Our Products & Materials
GALLERY.SUBTITLE: 取扱商品・素材 | Products We Handle

COPPER.PAGE_SUBTITLE: 銅買取・販売 | Premium Copper Scrap & Products

HERO.TITLE: High-Value Copper Trading
HERO.DESCRIPTION: We specialize in buying and selling all grades of copper scrap and products. From industrial wire scrap to premium cathodes, we offer competitive pricing and reliable service for both domestic and export markets.

BUY.TITLE: We Buy Copper
BUY.DESC: Purchasing all grades of copper scrap from industrial, commercial, and individual sellers. Immediate payment and pickup available.

SELL.TITLE: We Sell Copper
SELL.DESC: Premium copper products for manufacturing, construction, and export. Custom specifications and bulk orders accepted.

EXPORT.TITLE: Export Services
EXPORT.DESC: Container loading and international shipping to Southeast Asia, China, and other global markets. Full documentation provided.

STEP_1.TITLE: Collection & Sorting
STEP_1.DESC: We collect copper scrap from various sources and sort by grade and purity level.

STEP_2.TITLE: Processing
STEP_2.DESC: Wire stripping, shredding, and cleaning to remove insulation and contaminants.

STEP_3.TITLE: Melting & Refining
STEP_3.DESC: High-temperature melting in furnaces with flux to remove impurities.

STEP_4.TITLE: Casting & Forming
STEP_4.DESC: Casting into ingots, billets, or wire rods for manufacturing use.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to Trade Copper?
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Whether you want to sell copper scrap or purchase premium copper products, we offer competitive prices and professional service.

ALUMINUM.PAGE_SUBTITLE: アルミニウム買取・販売 | Premium Aluminum Scrap & Products

HERO.TITLE: Professional Aluminum Trading
HERO.DESCRIPTION: We trade all forms of aluminum scrap and products, from common UBC cans to high-grade aerospace alloys. Our facilities handle sorting, processing, and preparation for both domestic use and international export.

BUY.TITLE: We Buy Aluminum
BUY.DESC: Purchasing all aluminum grades including UBC, extrusion, wheels, and cast. Competitive pricing based on LME rates.

SELL.TITLE: We Sell Aluminum
SELL.DESC: Primary and secondary aluminum products including ingots, billets, and customized alloys for manufacturing.

EXPORT.TITLE: Export Services
EXPORT.DESC: Containerized shipping to Asian markets with proper sorting, packaging, and full export documentation.

STEP_1.TITLE: Collection & Sorting
STEP_1.DESC: Segregation by alloy type and removal of contaminants like steel, plastic, and rubber.

STEP_2.TITLE: Shredding & Decoating
STEP_2.DESC: Mechanical shredding and thermal decoating to remove paints and lacquers.

STEP_3.TITLE: Melting & Refining
STEP_3.DESC: Melting in rotary furnaces with flux to remove impurities and dross.

STEP_4.TITLE: Casting & Rolling
STEP_4.DESC: Casting into ingots or direct chill casting into rolling slabs.

CTA.TITLE: Trade Aluminum With Us
CTA.DESCRIPTION: From beverage cans to aerospace alloys, we handle all types of aluminum. Get competitive pricing for your scrap or source quality materials for your production.

EXCAVATORS.PAGE_SUBTITLE: 油圧ショベル | Buy, Refurbish, Export

HERO.TITLE: Hydraulic Excavators
HERO.DESCRIPTION: We specialize in trading hydraulic excavators from 20-ton to 50-ton class. Our inventory includes popular models from Caterpillar, Komatsu, Hitachi, and Kobelco. All machines are inspected, refurbished as needed, and prepared for export to Southeast Asian markets.

BUY.TITLE: We Buy Excavators
BUY.DESC: Purchasing used excavators from construction companies, rental fleets, and auctions. Fair evaluation and immediate payment.

REFURBISHMENT.TITLE: Refurbishment
REFURBISHMENT.DESC: Professional repair and painting services to prepare machines for export. Engine overhaul and hydraulic system rebuilds available.

EXPORT.TITLE: Export Ready
EXPORT.DESC: Complete documentation, container loading, and shipping to Cambodia, Vietnam, Myanmar, and other destinations.

STEP_1.TITLE: Evaluation
STEP_1.DESC: Send photos and specs for price quote

CTA.TITLE: Have Excavators to Sell?
CTA.DESCRIPTION: We are actively looking for quality used excavators. Contact us with machine details for a competitive offer. We handle pickup, documentation, and export.

TRACTORS.PAGE_SUBTITLE: トラクター・農機具 | Farm Equipment Trading

HERO.TITLE: Agricultural Equipment Specialists
HERO.DESCRIPTION: We buy and sell tractors, combines, and agricultural implements. From compact orchard tractors to large combine harvesters, we handle all types of farm machinery for the Southeast Asian market.

IMPLEMENTS.TITLE: Agricultural Implements
IMPLEMENTS.DESCRIPTION: We also trade various implements and attachments for tractors and combines.

BUY.TITLE: We Buy Equipment
BUY.DESC: Purchasing used tractors and farm equipment from farmers, dealers, and auctions.

MAINTENANCE.TITLE: Maintenance
MAINTENANCE.DESC: Professional servicing, repairs, and preparation for tropical climate conditions.

EXPORT.TITLE: Export Ready
EXPORT.DESC: Container loading and shipping to Cambodia, Vietnam, Myanmar, and Laos.

CTA.TITLE: Farm Equipment Needed?
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Whether you want to sell used equipment or need quality tractors for your farm, we provide competitive pricing and reliable service.

PARTS.PAGE_SUBTITLE: 部品・コンポーネント | Genuine & Aftermarket Parts

HERO.TITLE: Heavy Equipment Parts Supplier
HERO.DESCRIPTION: We supply genuine and quality aftermarket parts for construction and agricultural machinery. From engine components to hydraulic systems, we stock thousands of parts for immediate shipment or can source specific items for your needs.

SOURCING.TITLE: Parts Sourcing
SOURCING.DESC: Can't find a part? We source hard-to-find components from our network of suppliers.

BULK.TITLE: Bulk Orders
BULK.DESC: Wholesale pricing for dealers and repair shops. Container shipments available.

SUPPORT.TITLE: Technical Support
SUPPORT.DESC: Expert advice on part selection and compatibility for your specific machine.

CTA.TITLE: Need Parts?
CTA.DESCRIPTION: Send us your part number or machine model for a quick quote. We stock common parts and can source specialized components.
